articles.title: Watch: Stunning Close-Up Of Sizzling Hot Lava Flowing From Italy's Mount Etna - NDTV
articles.description: A camera crew travelled around 2.7kms up Mount Etna to its southeast crater to capture a close up of the hot lava flowing from Europe's highest and most active volcano.
articles.content:
Italian authorities issued a "yellow" alert last week.
Sizzling red hot lava flowed down and smoke billowed from Mount Etna on the east coast of Sicily, Italy, in a stunning display earlier this wee… [+1787 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Denmark votes overwhelmingly to join EU common defence policy - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The Danish Prime Minister said the vote was an important to signal to Europe, Nato and Russia.
articles.content:
AN OVERWHELMING MAJORITY of Danes, almost 67%, have voted in favour of joining the EUs common defence policy 30 years after opting out.
The vote comes on the heels of neighbouring Finland and Sweden… [+4235 chars]

articles.author: Weizhen Tan
articles.title: How Russia could try to get around the European Union's oil sanctions - CNBC
articles.description: EU leaders on Monday agreed to ban 90% of Russian crude by the end of the year as part of the bloc's sixth sanctions package on Russia since it invaded Ukraine.
articles.content:
The EU's partial embargo covers Russian oil brought into the bloc by sea, with an exemption carved out for imports delivered by pipeline following opposition from Hungary.
